comment:
This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.
This is the market for  'furnace, wood chips, with silo, 300kW', in the Global geography.
Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.
This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a wood chips furnace that includes a silo and it is used for local heating networks. It has a lifetime of 20 years, a lifetime capacity of 52,560,000 kWh and capacity of 300 kW. The process includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the furnace, the water storage and the chimney, their decommission, wood chips storage and energy used for the construction.
name: market for furnace, wood chips, with silo, 300kW
